title: Tyler Robinson charged with murder of Charlie Kirk - and prosecutors seek death penalty
description: The 22-year-old was arrested after the right-wing influencer was shot dead at a rally in Utah.
content:
Tyler Robinson has been charged with the murder of right-wing influencer Charlie Kirk.
The 22-year-old, from Washington, Utah, was charged with aggravated murder, weapon, and obstruction of justice offences ahead of a court appearance later today.

title: Mandelson not given in-depth vetting before appointment, says Foreign Office
description: Letter to MPs says former US ambassador went through process only after his new role was announced to public
content:
Peter Mandelson was not subject to in-depth security vetting prior to his appointment as ambassador to Washington, the government has said.
The Cabinet Office conducted a due diligence process on Mandelson before he was chosen for the role but this w... [3984 chars]

title: UK set on resolving standoff with big pharma, science minister says
description: Patrick Vallance says relations must improve and NHS has to reverse decline in drugs investment
content:
The UK is determined to resolve its standoff with the pharmaceutical industry and reverse a 10-year decline in NHS spending on medicines, the science minister has told MPs after a string of drugmakers cancelled projects worth nearly £2bn.

title: New headache for Rachel Reeves as OBR expected to lower productivity forecast
description: Weaker growth outlook would set chancellor on course to break her fiscal rules without significant action in budget
content:
The Office for Budget Responsibility is expected to downgrade its key productivity forecast, the Guardian understands, setting Rachel Reeves on course to break her fiscal rules without significant action in the budget.

title: President Donald Trump's Air Force One due to land soon in UK for second state visit
description: The US president and First Lady Melania Trump will join King Charles at Windsor Castle for two days of events.
content:
Moment President Trump and First Lady Melania left for UK
About four hours ago, President Trump and his wife Melania took off on Air Force One and started their journey across the Atlantic.
